title: Personal Interview
content: I have my personal interview for pes coming up soon. What kind of questions should I expect to be asked? Will the q’s be more about me as a person and why I wanna join pes or will it be more academics oriented ?

comments.body: Wait why are you having interviews for pes?
None of us had interview, ask them why are they giving you an interview
What kind of questions did they ask you during BBA interview?
